screen_desc: This screenshot shows the "Theme" settings on a smartphone. The user can select a theme from the "My themes" section or choose from various color options displayed below. The currently selected color is dark gray, indicated by a checkmark. There is also an option to show more color choices at the bottom. The navigation bar is visible at the bottom of the screen.
action_think: The user wants to change the appearance of the keyboard, which is currently in the 'Theme' settings. The screen shows available color options for the theme, and the user is currently viewing the theme selection menu. Since the currently selected color is dark gray, I will change the theme to another color, which will affect the keyboard appearance. I will need to select a new color from the options provided.
action_plan: Select a different color from the available options to change the keyboard theme.
action_desc: Select a color from the available options to change the keyboard theme.
action_result: By clicking on the theme option located at the right and lower middle, you have opened the theme selection menu. This action allows you to choose and apply a new theme, which directly influences the appearance of the keyboard. This step is necessary to change the keyboard's look, making progress toward fulfilling the user request.
prev_action_result:
By clicking on the "Theme" option, you have accessed the theme customization settings. In the current screenshot, you can now see a selection of color themes that can be applied to your keyboard. The available options allow you to change the color of the keyboard to suit your preference, which directly addresses your request to change the keyboard's appearance. 

This action has made progress toward completing your request, as you are now in the appropriate section to customize the keyboard's theme.
